  <table class="schedule-table">
<tr>
<th>Day</th>
<th>Topics</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 1<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Getting Started</span></td>
<td><strong>Getting Started with R and RAISINS</strong><br>
Introduction to R: installation, setup, and basic workflow<br>
Guided live document for smooth installation and orientation<br>
Exploring RAISINS: overview, navigation, and capabilities</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 2<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Foundations</span></td>
<td><strong>Foundations of Experimental Design and Analysis</strong><br>
Principles of design of experiments (DOE)<br>
Creating experimental layouts in R and RAISINS<br>
Analysis of experimental data and interpretation of results</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 3<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Multivariate</span></td>
<td><strong>Multivariate Exploratory Techniques</strong><br>
Introduction to exploratory data analysis in agriculture and allied fields<br>
Principal Component Analysis (PCA): concepts and applications<br>
Cluster analysis and factor analysis: grouping and latent variable discovery</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 4<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Advanced Designs</span></td>
<td><strong>Advanced Designs in Agricultural Research</strong><br>
Factorial experiments: concepts, layout, and interpretation<br>
Split-plot and strip-plot designs: when and how to use them<br>
Practical demonstrations with real datasets</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 5<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Relationships</span></td>
<td><strong>Statistical Relationships and Modelling</strong><br>
Descriptive statistics and data summarization<br>
Correlation and regression analysis (simple and multiple)<br>
Introduction to logistic regression and interpretation in research contexts</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 6<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Genetics</span></td>
<td><strong>Statistical Genetics and Advanced Techniques</strong><br>
Introduction to statistical genetics<br>
Path analysis and stability analysis for genotype evaluation<br>
Variance components and heritability estimation</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Day 7<br><span style="font-size:0.98rem">Visualization</span></td>
<td><strong>Data Visualization and No-Code Analytics</strong><br>
Best practices in data visualization for agricultural research<br>
Generating impactful graphs and plots in R<br>
Leveraging RAISINS for no-code data analysis and visualization</td>
</tr>
</table>

// Schedule calendar popup

// Initial popup handling
const initialPopup = document.getElementById("initialPopup");
const mainContent = document.getElementById("mainContent");
const closePopup = document.getElementById("closePopup");

// Show popup and blur content on load

  initialPopup.style.display = "flex";
  mainContent.classList.add("blurred");
};

// Close popup and remove blur

  initialPopup.style.display = "none";
  mainContent.classList.remove("blurred");
